short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lightweight extension that adds Sitecore related hashflags to #Sitecore tags on Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Release 1.3.0 now supports Twitter's new default design!

Lightweight extension that adds Sitecore related hashflags to #Sitecore tags to Twitter (and Tweetdeck)

Supported Tags:
#Sitecore
#SitecoreMVP
#SitecoreJSS
#SCHackathon
#WomenOfSitecore
#SPE
#Coveo
#SUGCON
#SitecoreSYM
#SXA
